summary: Adds a Marriable-Standalone, Follower/Companion, Thief/Assassin/Ranger, to Dead Man\'s Drink in Falkreath. Shes got the Skillz that Killz.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Hey guys, this is my very first mod upload on the nexus.[/b]

Hope you like it, there will be more to come. :]                   


           --May Contain Nudity--

Chelsea is a Breton ranger and you can marry her. 
She is an essential follower so dragons don\'t eat her up.  :]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8060/8256846882_60cce244d7_b.jpg[/img]

[u]Requirements :[/u]
no other mods required

Any Screenshots to show Chelsea\'s accomplishments in your skyrim are welcome :)

I appreciate all comments even the negative ones. Please tell me of any problems you may experience and ill try to fix it.

Thanks

[u]Location:[/u]
Dead mans drink in Falkreath 

Post or email screenshots so I may better serve you,
and if you need to.. estany89@gmail.com
01001100 01101111 01110110 01100101 00111010 00100000 01010011 01110100 01100001 01100011 01100101 01111001  ^.~


If anybody feels objective, please PM me. I will then remove the part that shouldn\'t be here, or give you proper credits.

[u]Credits[/u]

Lovely hairs by Zn00p
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7403

The eyes of beauty by LogRaam
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
author: Kurumu1337
